description.p: ROS Industrial support for the Motoman MA1400 plus MotoMount Positioner.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman MA1400 robot plus MotoMount Positioner.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/366775/Blog_Robots/MA1440.pdf All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
